author: USA TODAY, Editors, USA TODAY
title: Social distancing guidelines, USNS Comfort, work disruptions: 5 things to know Tuesday
description: The White House to weigh in on additional social distancing, the USNS Comfort Navy hospital ship could be ready for NYC patients and more you need to know Tuesday.
content:
Coronavirus: White House to weigh in on social distancing
The White House coronavirus task force on Tuesday will give further details on its guidelines on social distancing aimed at slowing the spread of the coronavirus. President Donald Trump announced Sund… [+4875 chars]
